Text: Rent DVDs online free trial No late fees everPST IMAGE NCI Marketing Web Alert IMAGEPatrice Dear Friend Rent DVDs Online For a Limited Time Try NetFlix FREE IMAGE Tired of video store hassles The poor selection the lines the late fees Try a better way to rent DVDs Rent DVDs online from Netflix Click Here for the FREE TRIAL Its easy Create a list online of movies you want to see Netflix has the worlds largest selection of DVDs Netflix sends you the first three movies from your list in two to four days via firstclass mail No due dates and no late fees means you can keep them as long as you want Have up to three on hand When youre done watching one send it back in its prepaid envelope and Netflix will send you another from your list Netflixcom See for yourself Right now Netflix is offering a FREE TRIAL of their service Click Here Free trial valid in the United States and its territories and possessions only Please visit wwwnetflixcom for complete terms and conditions This free trial offer expires on and cannot be combined with any other offer Limit one per household Firsttime customers only Cash redemption value cent Offer only available to United States residents Netflix reserves the right to change the terms and conditions at any time Netflixcom Inc You are receiving this special offer because you have provided permission to receive third party email communications regarding special online promotions or offers If you do not wish to receive any further messages from Network Commerce please click here to unsubscribe Any thirdparty offers contained in this email are the sole responsibility of the offer originator Copyright Network Commerce Inc
